objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#e5d3c1;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#c9b09b;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#d6c3b0;stop-opacity:0.8' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#a68e7b;stop-opacity:0.8' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)' /><rect x='0' y='750' width='1080' height='330' fill='#a68e7b' opacity='0.15' /><g opacity='0.1'><rect x='25' y='25' width='1030' height='1030' stroke='#6b4e32' stroke-width='2' fill='none' rx='15' ry='15' /><rect x='45' y='45' width='990' height='990' stroke='#6b4e32' stroke-width='1' fill='none' rx='10' ry='10' /></g><g opacity='0.05'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='350' fill='#6b4e32' /><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='250' fill='#a68e7b' /></g><g opacity='0.03'><path d='M0,0 L1080,1080 M1080,0 L0,1080' stroke='#6b4e32' stroke-width='2' /></g></svg>

objects.text: Premium Oversized Wool Blend Coat in Sophisticated Camel

Luxurious wool-blend construction • Chic oversized silhouette
Classic camel color • Wide notched lapels • Premium button closure
Generous deep pockets • Timeless design that never goes out of style

product_details.name: Elegance Defined: Premium Oversized Wool Blend Coat in Sophisticated Camel
product_details.description:
• Luxurious wool-blend construction for superior warmth and comfort
• Chic oversized silhouette with dropped shoulders for modern sophistication
• Classic camel color perfect for versatile styling
• Wide notched lapels and premium button closure
• Generous deep side pockets for functionality
• Cuffed sleeves for refined detailing
• Length hits below knee for maximum coverage
• Perfect layering piece for professional and casual outfits
• Available in sizes XS-XL
• Ideal for fall/winter seasons
• Easy-care fabric blend that maintains shape
• Timeless design that never goes out of style

banner_details:
This fashion-forward banner features a central product image (“product_image”) of a model wearing a premium oversized camel coat, perfectly aligned to create a minimalist luxury aesthetic. At the top, the bold heading (“heading”) and elegant subheading (“subheading”) convey sophistication, complemented by fine serif typography. Below the model, a balanced block of key descriptors (“description”) describes product features with bullet separators, maintaining a clean, editorial feel. The price text (“price”) is prominently displayed in bold font, drawing immediate attention. A call-to-action button (“cta_button_background” & “cta”) in rich brown, anchored near the bottom, completes this refined fashion advertisement.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige: `#e5d3c1`
- Warm Camel: `#c9b09b`
- Rich Taupe Brown: `#6b4e32`
- Muted Coffee: `#7d5e45`
- Ivory White: `#f2e9e1`
- Subtle Almond: `#a68e7b`
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated and elegant neutral-toned outfit, perfect for creating a classy advertisement banner. The primary color palette consists of warm camel beige (#C4A484), soft taupe brown (#9C8B76), crisp white (#FFFFFF), and dark olive green (#3B4D3F) seen on the shoes. The camel coat and matching trousers smoothly blend into one another, creating a monochromatic yet dynamic visual effect. The pristine white shirt acts as a contrast highlight, adding freshness and elevating the ensemble. The subtle green shoes introduce depth without stealing attention. The colors are harmoniously balanced, seamlessly blending while emphasizing texture and structure.
